content.question: The purpose of the speaker’s question in lines 3-4 (“But...inspire?”) is to

choices.label: accuse the lady of fickleness and inconstancy
rationalize the speaker’s position as one of many ill-treated victims
deplore the unjust circumstances that the lady has forced upon the speaker
reproach the lady’s encouragement in others of what she will not feel

content.answer: reproach the lady’s encouragement in others of what she will not feel

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
